testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to register page.......................................passed And Step 2 user select gender type..........................................passed And Step 3 user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"........passed And Step 4 user enter date of birth.........................................passed And Step 5 user enter email "test@example.com" field........................passed And Step 6 user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".................passed When Step 7 user clicks on register button..................................passed Then Step 8 success message is displayed....................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to login page..........................................passed And Step 2 user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"........passed When Step 3 user press on login button......................................passed Then Step 4 user login to the system successfully...........................passed

testcase.classname: F03_forgetPassword | users could use forget password functionality to recover their accounts
testcase.name: users could use forget password functionality to recover their accounts
testcase.system-out: Given Step 1 user go to login page..........................................passed And Step 2 user click on forget password....................................passed When Step 3 user enter email address........................................passed And Step 4 user click on recover button.....................................passed Then Step 5 message is displayed "Email with instructions has been sent to you".passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could be able to search using product name
testcase.name: user could be able to search using product name
testcase.system-out: When user search using product nike name....................................passed Then user should be able to find items with product name....................passed

testcase.classname: F05_currencies | customer can choose currency type that he would like to deal with
testcase.name: customer can deal with Euro
testcase.system-out: When Step 1 user select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed Then Step 2 Euro Symbol € is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page.passed

testcase.classname: F06_hover| user could be able to hover on categories to select subcategories
testcase.name: user could be able to hover on categories to select subcategories
testcase.system-out: When select one of the three main categories to hover randomly..............passed And select one of the three subcategories to hover randomly.................passed Then the page title should be the same as the selected one..................passed

testcase.classname: F07_filter| user could be able to filter by color
testcase.name: user could be able to filter by color

testcase.classname: F08_filter| user could be able to select by tag
testcase.name: user could be able to select by tag
testcase.system-out: When user click on any category.............................................passed And user click on any tag item..............................................passed Then tag windows should be open.............................................passed

testcase.classname: F09_AddToCart | Success message appears when clicking on add to cart button
testcase.name: success message appears in green background when user add item to cart
testcase.system-out: When user click on add to cart..............................................passed Then added success message is displayed.....................................passed And background color is green...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_Wishlist | Success message appears when clicking on wishlist button
testcase.name: success message appears in green background when user add item to wishlist
testcase.system-out: When user click on wishlist icon............................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And background color is green...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F10_Wishlist | Success message appears when clicking on wishlist button
testcase.name: items should be added to wishlist page and Qty should be bigger than 0
testcase.system-out: When user click on wishlist icon............................................passed And user wait until this success message with green color to disappear......passed When click on Wishlist Tab..................................................passed Then Verify qty value bigger than 0.........................................passed

testcase.classname: F11_ProductComparison | Success message appears when clicking on compare button
testcase.name: success message appears in green background when user click on item compare
testcase.system-out: When user click on compare button...........................................passed Then comparison success message is displayed................................passed And background color is green...............................................passed
